<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Lissala (The Sihedron Scion)](/Deities.aspx?ID=156)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 130 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Work hard and demand others do so as well, cooperate or avoid conflict with ophidian creatures

**Anathema** Disobey a superior, shirk your duties, destroy a book

**Follower Alignments**
LN, LE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Skill** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)

**Favored Weapon** [Whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48)

**Domains** [Fate](/Domains.aspx?ID=12), [Glyph](/Domains.aspx?ID=46), [Magic](/Domains.aspx?ID=19), [Toil](/Domains.aspx?ID=39)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Message Rune](/Spells.aspx?ID=581)

- **3rd**
[Secret Page](/Spells.aspx?ID=270)

- **6th**
[Dominate](/Spells.aspx?ID=87)

</column>
name: Lissala (The Sihedron Scion)
